H0.text: For what novel did J. K. Rowling win the 1999 Whitbread Children's book of the year award. Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone

H1.text: For what novel did J. K. Rowling win the 1999 Whitbread Children's book of the year award. The Secret Garden by Frances Hodgson Burnett

H2.text: For what novel did J. K. Rowling win the 1999 Whitbread Children's book of the year award. The Golden Compass by Philip Pullman

H3.text: For what novel did J. K. Rowling win the 1999 Whitbread Children's book of the year award. HP3

A4.text: It was also shortlisted for children's books awards adjudicated by adults, but did not win.

A5.text: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone won the British Book Awards Children's Book of the Year.

A6.text: The award body gave Rowling the children's prize instead (worth half the cash amount).

A7.text: Whitbread Best Book Award: Seamus Heaney, Beowulf
